name: Steel-Cut Oat Bars
author: Renee
summary: You control the ingredients in this great grab-and-go snack. Use your favorite type of granola and any type of fruit or nuts.
ingredients: ¼ cup dark chocolate chips, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line a 9x13-inch baking dish with parchment paper
Combine pecans, oats, granola, coconut oil, almonds, raspberries, raisins, mashed banana, egg white, peanut butter, honey, vanilla extract, baking powder, and cinnamon in a large bowl
Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and press into a thin layer with your hands; you may need to coat your hands with coconut oil so the mixture doesn't stick
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Lower oven temperature to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C), and cook until golden brown, about 45 minutes
Let cool completely before slicing into bars
